entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Guysborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 1:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: SE 26 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to freezing rain this evening then to snow after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 8 except minus 12 inland.
